description: Développeur expérimenté en applications web et mobile, spécialisé en TypeScript, Node.js et React. Mes réalisations incluent la création d'une plateforme de réservation avec systèmes de paiement pour LaPetitePouzerie.fr et l'implémentation d'un moteur de recherche pour les jeux vidéo sur Gamewisher.com. À la recherche d'un poste de développeur à CoderPad, où je pourrais apporter mes compétences en développement front-end et back-end dans un environnement Agile, pour soutenir votre équipe Tech à renforcer vos produits et assurer leur évolutions.

experiences.title: Entrepreneur and Full Stack developer
tasks: Created a search engine for mobile video games. It allows the community to leave reviews and write articles, and I have written about twenty articles
The platform is designed using TypeScript, Nest.js, Next.js and GitHub Actions

experiences.title: Community manager and Content creator
tasks: Published 100+ documentaries, guides, and tutorials. In English or French
Leads and animates a gaming discord server with about 3000 members, and I am still actively doing so in 2024

experiences.title: Freelance and remote work
tasks: Created from scratch a booking platform including payment and availability management using TypeScript, Node.js, React and GitHub Actions
Collaborated with a designer and integrated her Figma mockups

experiences.title: [Remote] Freelance
tasks: Developed a mobile application for equipment management via Bluetooth using TypeScript and React-native

experiences.title: Tech Lead Android Application
tasks: Developed an Android application for the Danish bus transport network using TypeScript and React-native.

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
tasks: Designed components in a ticketing product within an Agile (Scrum) team of 10 people using Java, Spring and Angular
Managed and mentored front-end developers, ensuring best practices and standards were followed.

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
tasks: Developed in a team of 8 people a system configuration software as well as the back-office for the ticketing system of several transport operators using C# and ASP.Net

formations.title: Web and Mobile Ergonomics and UX
Expert in Software and System Development Engineering

skills.name: Autonomy
skills.subtitle: I conduct continuous technological watch and training

skills.name: Knowlegde sharing
skills.subtitle: I support and assist my colleagues to progress together
